items.text: length ball, he chooses to stay back to it and pats it back to the bowler
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Bravo, no run

items.text: flatter on the stumps, tapped to the bowler's left
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Bravo, no run

items.text: fuller on off, he opens the face to steer it towards point
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: gave himself room and tried to go big, inside out over cover, but only gets an inside edge that ricochets off his pad
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: fuller ball outside off, comes forward to defend
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.preText: Peter: "Dipak Patel will always be best remembered for being the man who opened the bowling in the 1992 World Cup. I guess he is the first one to do that." - yes it was a revolutionary tactic by Martin Crowe
items.text: driven to long-off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: drags it down short and flat, clipped to midwicket from his crease
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: tossed up a bit more, he comes forward and drives it, but cover tumbles and fields
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: length ball on the stumps, watchfully defended off the front foot
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: quicker and flatter on a length, on the stumps, blocked back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: slightly back of a length, he transfers weight back and punches it to long-on
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.preText:
contrasting opinions on Bangladesh's tactics continue to stream in:

Saif: "I agreed with Ramesh. Bangladesh should start their World Cup preparation right from this series. Opening with two spinners reflects that they are not bothered with World Cup yet. "

Joy: "There is a dew factor, which may influence Mashrafee to fill spiners quota in early "
items.text: fuller on the stumps, he defends from the crease
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: flighted outside off, he went down to sweep. Ball hits pad and there is a stifled appeal. But that was hitting him outside off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, no run

items.text: back of a length on off, he stays in his crease and punches to wide long-off
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Hope, 1 run

items.text: flatter outside off, pushed to cover. There hasn't been much turn for the spinners so far
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Bravo, no run

items.text: tossed up and dips nicely, beats Bravo's attempted flick and hits him high on the pad
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Bravo, no run

items.text: good shot transfers weight back to powerfully punch this through the off side cordon. It was marginally short and he spotted it early and took full toll
items.shortText: Shakib Al Hasan to Bravo, FOUR runs

items.text: drifts down leg, and is picked off his pads by going deep into the crease and flicking to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, 1 run

items.text: drifts too far down leg, past the pad. Wide
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, 1 wide

items.text: nicely flighted and beats him, strikes him on the pad. Belts out an appeal but the umpire is ummoved. Probably sliding down
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, no run

items.text: comes forward to turn this round the corner
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Bravo, 1 run

items.text: comes on the front foot to this fuller length ball and wrists it to midwicket
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: quicker ball, slightly shorter, punched back to the bowler
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: big appeal They're thinking about a review but decide against it. Nicely flighted, the batsman took a few steps down the track and tried to play a big, booming drive, but was beaten and hit on the pads. The bowler seemed confident, but perhaps the batsman was too far down for Mashrafe Mortaza to chance a review
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Hope, no run

items.text: starts off with a loosener down leg, which will be a wide
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Bravo, 1 wide
